dcterms:description: A dataset used for the SemEval-2020 Task 5 focused on counterfactual recognition, providing annotated training data for detecting counterfactual statements.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2020 Task 5

dcterms:description: A dataset created to recognize counterfactual thinking in social media texts, combining rule-based keywords and manual annotation.
dcterms:title: Counterfactual data set (created by Son et al., 2017)

dcterms:description: An alternate dataset augmented with back-translated sentences to enhance the training data for counterfactual detection.
dcterms:title: Alternate dataset (augmented with back-translated sentences)

dcterms:description: A discourse treebank providing annotated data for discourse relations, useful for understanding the structure of language.
dcterms:title: Penn Discourse Treebank 2.0
